content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Viktor Yanukovych

greets Yanukovych upon his arrival to the Planalto Palace in Brasília, Brazil, 25 October 2011.]]
talks with President Viktor Yanukovych during a pull aside at the 2012 Nuclear Security Summit at the Coex Center in Seoul]]
Viktor Yanukovych has made several international trips in his capacity as the president of Ukraine from 25 February 2010 – 22 February 2014.
